entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lévis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
